alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 11:32AM EST until December 23 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Souhegan River At Milford affecting Hillsborough County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. For the Souhegan River...including Milford, Merrimack...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souhegan River at Milford. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Floodwaters inundate a portion of Route 101A in Milford and spread into property of the Milford water utilities department and Granite Town Plaza. Floodwaters encroach on low lying properties in Wilton including some on Intervale Road and Monadnock Water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
